page.title: 13LEISURE SALTFORD WEST BATH
page.content: {Water Sports}(River Avon) Two marinas with approximately 80/90 cabin cruisers one rowing club. One sailing club with clubhouse. Angling and canoeing. {Women's groups}. Two women's institutes (afternoon and evening)with approximate memberships of 100. Mothers'Union, St.Mary's wives and the merry wives,associated with St.Mary's church. Women's Bright hour,associated with the Evangelical Church. {Saltford Community Hall }Clubs meeting in the hall with its five rooms of varying size: - Drama,Old Time Dancing,Painting,Photograpic,Horticult ural,Saltford Singers,Badminton, Floral,Gardeners.Several political parties also meet in the Hall.
